Shasta area in the State of California as a historic district, historic sites, or national monument under the National Historic Preservation Act or the Antiquities Act.

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an inflation adjustment for the amount of the maximum benefit under the special estate tax valuation rules for certain farm, etc., real property.

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

title: Unfunded Federal Mandates Relief Act of 1997

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture.

title: Forest Service Employment Opportunity Act of 1997

latestAction.text: Became Public Law No: 105-44.

title: To designate the reservoir created by Trinity Dam in the Central Valley project, California, as "Trinity Lake".

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit or refund of motor fuel excise taxes on fuel used by the motor of a highway vehicle to operate certain power takeoff equipment on such vehicle.
